articles.title: KANPC indicts U.S. imperialists for violating Geneva agreement
Intelligence reports of "ANSP" brought to light
articles.content:
KANPC indicts U.S. imperialists for violating Geneva agreement  

   Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean Anti-Nuke Peace Committee today made public an indictment to clearly disclose how the United States has violated the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework reached in Geneva and how seriously the violation has threatened the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and hindered the DPRK's socialist economic construction.
   The indictment comes as the United States is these days creating greater military threats to the DPRK, crying that the DPRK has violated the Geneva agreement by building a "suspected underground nuclear facility."
   The indictment said:
   On October 21, 1994, the DPRK and the United States of America held talks on comprehensive solution to the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula in Geneva and signed an agreed framework.
   In the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework called the Geneva agreement, the sides promised to solve the nuclear issue and came to terms on matters of principle arising in the DPRK-U.S. relations.
   Four odd years have passed since the adoption of the agreement. But, the United States has implemented none of the items agreed on by the two countries.
   Facts clearly show the United States is the violator of the Geneva agreement.
   The ground for the two light-water reactors, which the U.S. is obliged to hand over to the DPRK on a turn-key basis after completing them in a responsible way by the year 2003, has not been broken satifactorily even today when nearly half of the set time has elapsed. Accordingly, the full-scale project is so vague that no one can say when it will Be begun and completed.
   Shipments of heavy oil have also been delayed owing to the U.S. insincere implementation of its obligation.
   In the Geneva agreement, the U.S. is obliged to ease bans on trade and investment. However, it has tightened economic sanctions, groundlessly including the DPRK in the "list of sponsors of terrorism."
   The indictment documented the fact that the Geneva agreement has not been fully implemented because the United States and its followers have pursued the anti-DPRK suffocation strategy and confrontation policies.
   It went on to say:
   The United States signed the Geneva agreement not because it was truly concerned about the proliferation of nuclear weapons or interested in the improvement of the DPRK-U.S.relations and the peace and security of the Korean peninsula.
   The real reason is that, unable to stifle the DPRK with strength, the U.S. foolishly planned to put off the time with light-water reactors as a bait so as to block the development of the DPRK's  self-reliant nuclear power industry, weaken its economic and military potentials and thus "wither" and "destroy" the DPRK.
   The U.S. moves to delay implementing the Geneva agreement have created four years of vacuum in the development of our self-supporting nuclear power industry and caused a great shortage of energy, thus having a serious effect on  our socialist planned economy as a whole.
   Direct losses caused by them amount to tens of billions of dollars.
   If the project of building our self-supporting nuclear power industrial base had been promoted as planned, it would have been completed by this time and, accordingly,  there would have been no shortage in the supply of energy and our socialist economy would have produced a great fruition.
   In the long run, what we have gained in "reward" for faithfully implementing the Geneva agreement are nothing but economic losses.
   It is  common sense in view of international law or usage that if one side does harm to the other side by violating an agreement, it should make compensation or reparation for the losses.
   The United States has the obligation and responsibility to make compensation for the economic losses inflicted upon the DPRK and must pay for them in any form.
   The present economic difficulties of the Korean people are wholly ascribable to the wrong Korea policy of the U.S. the frantic racket of the United States and its followers over "suspected underground nuclear facility" and their military threats against the DPRK mean the abandonment of the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework, a declaration of war and provocation against the DPRK. If the U.S., approaching the Geneva agreement with insincerity, continues to delay implementing it although it promised before the world, the DPRK also has no intention of observing it, suffering only losses. The DPRK is fully ready to cope with a declaration of abandonment of the agreement, a declaration of war or any provocation. If the U.S. finally imposes military confrontation in violation of the Geneva agreement, the DPRK will unhesitatingly counter it and not miss the opportunity to wreak the pent-up grudge of national division and accomplish the cause of national reunification.
   The United States, the South Korean authorities, the Japanese reactionaries and other followers will never flee from the responsibility for violating the Geneva agreement.
   They would be well advised to clearly see what consequences will occur and stop running rashly.

articles.title: They will not be pardoned at all =KCNA commentary=
articles.content:
Intelligence reports of "ANSP" brought to light
    Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The opposition "Grand National Party" brought to light on January 2 some of intelligence reports of the "Agency for National Security Planning" it confiscated when it occupied a secret office of the "ANSP" in the "National Assembly" building at the end of last year, a Seoul-based radio said.
   The intelligence reports deal in detail with tendencies of the opposition "National Assemblymen," including moves of the opposition "National Assemblymen" to break with their party, possible joining in the ruling party, whether "National Assemblymen" of influence in minority group of the opposition party are willing to found a new political party or not, the radio said.
   Among the intelligence reports is a report on a "strategy" to keep a veil over the "constitutional revision for the parliamentary cabinet system," which calls for putting pressure upon the "United Liberal Democrats" on the plea of economic difficulties in a bid to turn down an agreement on the "constitutional revision for the parliamentary cabinet system."
   The "Grand National Party" threatened to disclose some 40 more intelligence reports, while calling for an immediate closure of the secret office of the "ANSP" in the "National Assembly" building and the withdrawal of the "ANSP" agents.

articles.title: "Hanchongryon"-lining students' anti-U.S. struggle
articles.content:
They will not be pardoned at all =KCNA commentary=

    Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The South Korean authorities engage themselves in a desperate anti-DPRK smear campaign from the beginning of the year.
   On January 3 the Ministry of National Defense published copies of literature which describes the north as "arch enemy" to distribute them to all army units.
   Such a  literature should come as no surprise at a time when the "Minister of National Defense" and other senior officials of the military call for remembering that the "arch enemy" is the north almost every day. In the tawdry literature the  Ministry of National Defense growled forth imprecation on the dignified political system in the north, the imprecation which cannot be pardoned at all.
   It is a well-known fact that while engaging themselves in anti-DPRK diatribe, they have screwed up inter-Korean rivalry through an unbroken chain of provocation. Their recent anti-DPRK diatribe, the climax of those provocation, means that they declared a total showdown with the north, throwing off the hypocritical veil of "dialogue" and "exchange." 
   The South Korean authorities seek in this to prevent the officers and men of the "rok" army from sympathizing with North Korea. They should be mindful that their anti-north smear campaign is a foolish act which will only precipitate their destruction.
   The Korean people and people's army consider that to devotedly defend the socialist homeland, their destiny and future is life and soul. To this end they are not squeamish in their choice of means and methods.
   Hawks of the South Korean military deserve a retaliatory punishment for their grisliest crime ever known in history.
   The people's army keep an eye on their every movement.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial supported abroad
articles.content:
"Hanchongryon"-lining students' anti-U.S. struggle
   Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- More than 300 students of the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) held a rally for an anti-U.S. struggle at Hanyang University on January 5 and staged a demonstration, the January 6 issue of the South Korean Choong-ang Daily said.
   The demonstrators voiced opposition to the U.S. domination over and intervention in South Korea under the International Monetary Fund regime, fiercely fighting with the police hell-bent on suppression.

articles.title: Bust of DPRK hero Jo Tong Su unveiled
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial supported abroad
  Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea released a statement on Monday supporting the joint new year editorial of the newspapers of the party, army and youth league.
   The statement says that on the New Year Korean leading newspapers,  including Rodong Sinmun, called upon all the Korean people to let the year 1999 mark a turning-point in building a powerful nation.
   The editorial called upon the Korean people to push ahead with a second grand march of Chollima under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as they built a socialist country, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, on the ruins through the grand march of Chollima under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung, the statement says.
   Especially, the statement  says that the editorial called upon all the Koreans at home and abroad to get united under the uplifted banner of national reunification irrespective of difference in ideology, ideal, religious belief, political view and  class and social stratum.
   The statement says that the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea,   as well as the world progressive people, expresses full support for the joint editorial and will more courageously conduct an international solidarity movement for achieving the Korean people's cherished desire to live in a reunified country independently and peacefully .

articles.title: Meetings held across country
articles.content:
Bust of DPRK hero Jo Tong Su unveiled
   
     Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Ryongam Senior Middle School in Myongchon county, North Hamgyong Province, was named after Jo Tong Su, a hero of the DPRK, and his bust was erected at the school.
   Jo Tong Su set a living example in defending the leader devotedly.
   The school was named after the DPRK hero and his bust was unveiled with due ceremony recently.
   It was said at the ceremony that the eternal image of the DPRK hero Jo Tong Su to whom General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave prominence reflects his great loving care to convey the exploits of the hero along with the times and history and his great expectation that the arriving generations will live like the hero who remained faithful to the party and the leader.
   It was also said that all the teachers and students should prepare themselves as true loyal and filial subjects who absolutely worship and follow the Marshal with pure and invariable loyalty to the party and the leader as the hero Jo did.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Japan's decision to develop information-gathering satellites
articles.content:
Meetings held across country

    Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Meetings have been held across the country to carry through tasks laid down in the Joint New Year Editorial.
   Meetings took place in North Hamgyong, South Phyongan and South Hwanghae provinces and Kaesong city on January 5 and 6.
   The meetings called for performing  exploits in the honorable and worthwhile general onward movement to let this year mark a great turning-point in building a powerful nation.
   They called for thoroughly applying the Korean-style formula of revolution in all domains and units so as to carry out the basic task of the economic construction and vast tasks for this year, set forth in the joint editorial.
   They called for a general onward march toward a hopeful new century under the wise guidance of the great Kim Jong Il.
   A meeting of farmers of the Chongsan Cooperative Farm, Kangso district, Nampho, which was held on January 6, adopted an appeal to the agricultural workers throughout the country.

articles.title: Cardinal economic task for this year
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Japan's decision to develop information-gathering satellites
  Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government made a legal decision to develop information-gathering satellites. Synchronising with this, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Japan published a "report" on "missile threats" from the DPRK.
   Commenting on this fact, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun today says:
   Japan's recent movements show that the Japanese reactionaries are trying to make a military showdown with the DPRK in cahoots with the United States.
   It is an established fact that Japan will join in a second Korean war which will be unleashed by the United States.
   Having made military preparations for overseas aggression, the Japanese reactionaries are trying to put military equipment on a more modern basis and perfect operational factors.
   Japan's plan to introduce information-gathering satellites is part of their endeavours.
   Japan is loudly crying that the development of these satellites is intended to keep off "missile strikes" by the DPRK. However, it is as clear as noonday that those satellites will be used for making a preemptive strike at the DPRK in the event of contingency.
   The Japanese reactionaries must clearly know their opponents and stop running rashly.
   No matter how desperately they may try with the backing of the United States, Japan will never escape from an annihilating retaliatory blow by the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreign party and state leaders support Korean people's reunification cause
articles.content:
Cardinal economic task for this year

Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The basic task facing Korea in economic construction this year is to put production on a steady footing in all domains of the national economy, put the economy as a whole on the right track and provide the people with a stable and better living conditions.
   Particular efforts should be directed to the full display of the production potentials of key industries of the national economy.
   Nationwide efforts will be channelled into completing as early as possible the building of  large-scale hydraulic power stations now underway and into pushing ahead with the construction of minor power stations.
   In coal industry tunnelling and pit construction should Be kept ahead of anything else to create more coal fields and increase production.
   The Juche character and independence of metal industry should be strengthened, iron and steel production put on a high level, the strain on railway transport eased and the nation's natural resources developed in full swing to guarantee economic prosperity.
   Major projects, including the Pyongyang-Nampho Express Highway, should be promoted.
   A great upswing will be effected in potato farming and agricultural structure will be improved on the principle of right crop on right soil and right crop in the right time.
   In light industry all the local-industry factories will put machines to full capacity in full reliance upon local reserves and potentials.
   The nation's science and technology as a whole will achieve the development of world standard.
   Working people across the country are conducting a powerful campaign for increased production from the beginning of the year in order to let this year mark a turning-point in building a powerful nation.

articles.title: Han Tok Su calls for greater progress in patriotic work
articles.content:
Foreign party and state leaders support Korean people's reunification cause
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign party and state leaders voiced full support for the reunification cause of the Korean people when they met with Korean ambassadors to their countries.
   Acting head of State of Cambodia and President of the National Assembly of Cambodia Norodom Ranariddh expressed his belief that all the Korean people and army will firmly defend sovereignty and independence of the country, and reunify the divided country, true to the last teachings of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, under the wise guidance of the Marshal Kim Jong Il.
   General secretary  H.S. Surjeet of the C.C., the Communist Party of India  (Marxist) said that his party always supports  the line and policies of national reunification put forward by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and that Korea will surely be reunified by the WPK and the Korean people led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
  General secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India A.B. Bardhan said that his party extends full support and solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in the revolutionary cause for accomplishment of the cause of independence against imperialism, holding aloft the socialist banner.
    General secretary of the C.C., the All-India Forward Bloc Debabrata Biswas said that all the members and the central committee of his party always extend firm solidarity to the line and policy of the WPK and just cause of the Korean people for national reunification.

articles.title: U.S. imperialists hit for new war provocation moves
articles.content:
Han Tok Su calls for greater progress in patriotic work 

   Tokyo, January 5 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairman of the central standing committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) Han Tok Su stressed in his address to the Korean residents in Japan on the New Year called for greater progress in patriotic work to suit the requirements of a new era, the January 1 issue of Joson Sinbo published in Japan said.
   Touching upon successes in Chongryon work, he said that officials of Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan have pushed ahead with a vigorous onward movement, smashing the frantic anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon campaign of reactionaries at home and abroad, on the strength of the monolithic unity.
   He said that in the New Year, Juche 88 (1999) compatriots should cherish the patriotic faith that they are sure to win as they are led by the Marshal Kim Jong Il, defend democratic national rights and interests in reliance upon the single-hearted unity and conduct a patriotic movement with redoubled efforts for national reunification and development.

articles.title: United we win, divided we fall
articles.content:
U.S. imperialists hit for new war provocation moves
  Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Bangladesh on Dec. 30 last year to denounce the U.S. imperialists for new war provocation moves.
   A.F.M. Mahbubul Huq, chairman of the Bangladesh Left Democratic Front in his speech bitterly denounced the remarks made by U.S. President Clinton in Seoul and a U.S. plan for unleashing a new war, considering them extreme provocation and reckless war hysterics which pose grave threat to world peace. 
   He expressed his belief that the great Korean people and heroic Korean People's Army will crush the aggressive scheming of the U.S. imperialists at one stroke and defend the gains of socialism under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il.
   He said that the Bangladeshi people will always stand firm by the Korean people. He called upon the world peace-loving people to express firm solidarity and support for the just cause of the Korean people.
   A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Great national unity, cornerstone of reunification
articles.content:
United we win, divided we fall
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today in a signed article points out that all the anti-imperialist independent forces should strengthen unity and solidarity to successfully carry out the human cause of independence.
   It says:
   It is a historical truth proved in practice that united we win divided we fall.
   Imperialism resorts to every conceivable means for its dominationist purpose of aggression and plunder. Therefore, the struggle against it requires unity and solidarity among the anti-imperialist independent forces.
   The imperialists are more viciously challenging the human cause of independence, taking advantage of imbalance of forces in international arena.
   They are forcing their dominationist demand upon other nations and unhesitatingly committing  military intervention and aggression against other countries.
   The obtaining situation makes it incumbent upon the world people aspiring after independence to unite and wage  a joint struggle against imperialism.
   "World people advocating independence, unite ", this is an international slogan the progressive people of the world should hold high. 
   What's important in strengthening the unity and solidarity of the anti-imperialist independent forces is to maintain independence and keep a principled stand toward imperialism.
   All the anti-imperialist forces should hold fast to the principle of  struggling in unity and uniting in struggle.

articles.title: Dangerous moves of U.S. and Japanese reactionaries  for war provocation against north
articles.content:
Great national unity, cornerstone of reunification
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Great national unity in Korea is a basic cornerstone for accomplishing the cause of national reunification, Rodong Sinmun today stresses in a signed article.
   To achieve the great unity of the whole nation is a decisive guarantee for the independent and peaceful reunification of the fatherland, the article says, and goes on:
   The present situation,  seeing in a new historic era of national reunification, requires great national unity more urgently than ever before.
   General Secretary Kim Jong Il gained a deep insight into the ardent desire of the nation to achieve national reunification with concerted efforts and the requirement of the times and comprehensively consummated the essence and foundation of great national unity and the originality of President Kim Il Sung's idea of great national unity and his immortal exploits. On this basis Kim Jong Il clarified the five-point policy of great national unity.
   The five-point policy as well as the 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation put forward by President Kim Il Sung are the banner the entire nation should uphold and the political programme of great national unity they must invariably defend and realize without fail. 
To carry through the five-point policy is the way of national unity and reunification that the Korean nation wishes.
   The great national unity should be realized on the principle of national independence. The principle of national independence is the core of resolving the national problem and the foundation of the great unity of the entire nation.
   To achieve the great national unity at present, the north-south relations of distrust and confrontation should be turned into the relations of trust and reconciliation.
   And the Korean people should reject outsiders' domination and interference and vigorously struggle against the traitors and anti-reunification forces teaming up with foreign forces.

articles.title: DPRK urges U.S. to compensate for economic losses
articles.content:
Dangerous moves of U.S. and Japanese reactionaries  for war provocation against north
    Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The support of the U.S.troops present in South Korea will be strengthened "in case of provocation by the north" from this year, according to a report of the South Korean Newspaper "Choong-ang Daily" dated Jan. 5.
   In this regard, the Minister of "National Defence" of South Korea  on Jan. 5 announced that "an agreement was reached on establishing the cooperation system between South Korea and the U.S." to provide against "limited provocation by the north".
   The U.S. troops present in South Korea will participate in "anti-spy operations"  against "limited provocation"  by someone, the paper said.
   It is an ill-boding act that the U.S. imperialist aggression forces are going to poke their nose into all the war provocation moves against the DPRK,  on the pretext of "limited provocation"  and "anti-spy operations".
   This shows that the U.S. imperialists are rolling up sleeves in the war provocation moves against the DPRK under the adventurous "operation plan 5027".
   Another ill-boding movement is that the director-general of the Defence Agency of Japan, who will visit South Korea from Jan. 6,  held a press conference on Jan. 5 and proposed the "establishment of communication system" for "close exchange of information" between the Japanese Defence Agency and the South Korean "Ministry of National Defence."
   All these facts prove that the U.S., Japan and the South Korean puppets are actually animating the criminal triangular military alliance for the implementation of the aggressive "operation plan 5027".
   By doing so, they openly betrayed their dangerous attempt to strengthen military blockade against the DPRK and stifle our socialist system by force of arms.
